verses.text: Make a joyful noise unto the \sc Lord\sc*, all ye lands.
Serve the \sc Lord\sc* with gladness: Come before his presence with singing.
Know ye that the \sc Lord\sc* he \add is\add* God: \add It is\add* he \add that\add* hath made us, and not we ourselves; \add We are\add* his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Enter \add into\add* his gates with thanksgiving, \add And\add* into his courts with praise: Be thankful unto him, \add and\add* bless his name.
For the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* good; his mercy \add is\add* everlasting; And his truth \add endureth\add* to all generations.
